section.name: Main interfaces...
section.p: The main interface of this package is the CaptchaEngine interface. It provides method to retrieve new Captchas.
Implementations are typed (image or sound) and use CaptchaFactory to build captchas.

section.name: ...and sample engines
section.p: This module provides lots of ready to use engines : see source.
See also home page samples : home
See the test report section for performance tests results.
